infoList.title: Guest Service
infoList.subtitle: Get in touch with our friendly guest service staff
infoList.details: Need a hand? Our friendly guest service staff is located near Entry 3. Available services are listed below.

additionalInfo.title: Wheelchairs & Scooters
additionalInfo.details: Wheelchairs & scooters are available on a first-come, first-served basis. Photo Identification and valid credit card are required.

additionalInfo.title: Lost & Found
additionalInfo.details:
Lost or found an item during your visit? Be sure to contact Guest service.

Found items are transferred to Guest service where they are kept for a period of 30 days.

additionalInfo.title: First Aid
additionalInfo.details: A first aid kit is available at the kiosk for our guests.

additionalInfo.title: Stow and Go
additionalInfo.details: If you have too much to carry and would like the freedom to shop some more, you can drop off your parcels at Guest Services. We'll store them securely while you shop. Once your shopping is complete, you can pick up your checked items from the comfort of your vehicle at Parcel Pick Up located at exterior Service Court 3D. A Guest Services team member will deliver the checked items to your vehicle. Free service.

infoList.title: Amenities
infoList.subtitle: Find the Washrooms, lockers, 24-hour security, ATM and other amenities
infoList.details: Looking for something else not listed? Tsawwassen Mills offers various amenities and complimentary services. View them on the interactive mall map. Guest Service Washrooms Lockers ATM Public telephones Shopping Shuttle Automobile battery boost Other Available Services: 24-hour security Wi-Fi Family conveniences Universal washrooms + Nursing lounges Stroller rentals Family parking Emergency infant supplies For more information please visit the website: https://www.tsawwassenmills.com/info/centre-services/

infoList.title: Gift Card Balance
infoList.subtitle: Check your Ivanho√© Cambridge Gift Card balance
infoList.details: The Ivanho&eacute Cambridge Gift Card is accepted at our 250 fashion, outlet, dining, and entertainment options. Available at our Guest Services kiosk.

additionalInfo.title: Check your gift card balance
additionalInfo.details: Already have a gift card? Tap on the "Check your balance" button above to check your balance online.

additionalInfo.title: Where to buy a gift card?
additionalInfo.details: Come visit us at the Guest Service kiosk to get yours today!

additionalInfo.title: Who accepts the gift card?
additionalInfo.details: The Ivanhoé Cambridge gift card is accepted by all retailers with the exception of those listed on the non-participating merchant list found here.

additionalInfo.title: Further notice
additionalInfo.details: Gift cards can be purchased in any denomination ranging from $5 to $500.

infoList.title: Public Transportation
infoList.subtitle: See public transportation information and schedules
infoList.details:
FROM BRIDGEPORT STATION CANADA LINE
Go to Bay 7
Hop on the #601 - South Delta via Ladner Exchange
Hop off at 52nd St.
-
Go to Bay 4
Hop on the #620 - Tsawwassen Ferry Terminal via Ladner Exchange
Hop off at 52nd St.
-
FROM TSAWWASSEN
Go to Bay 2
Hop on the #609 - South Delta Exchange
Hop off at 48th St.

infoList.title: Shopping Shuttle
infoList.subtitle: Our exclusive 42-passenger shopping shuttle provides free roundtrip transportation
infoList.details: Our exclusive 42-passenger shopping shuttle provides free roundtrip transportation from Tsawwassen Ferry Terminal to Tsawwassen Mills daily, coordinating with the Nanaimo and Victoria ferry sailing times. Please note Ferry parking is not permitted at Tsawwassen Mills.

infoList.title: Accessibility
infoList.subtitle: Tsawwassen Mills is committed to excellence in serving all customers
infoList.details:
Tsawwassen Mills is committed to excellence in serving all customers and is an easily-accessible, one level shopping centre with:

A Simple-to-Navigate Racetrack Design
Automatic Sliding Doors
Easily Accessible Washrooms
Prime Designated Accessible Parking Spaces
Complimentary Wheelchairs and Scooters

Wheelchairs & scooters are available on a first-come, first-served basis. Photo Identification and valid credit card are required.

infoList.title: About Tsawwassen Mills
infoList.subtitle: Learn more at Tsawwassen Mills
infoList.details: Mills malls are designed around all these feelings that come from a great shopping experience. All our efforts revolve around you. From the stores to the food, from the prices to the entertainment that can deliver for the whole entire family, a trip to a Mills mall is hard to match. Tsawwassen Mills, will include approximately 1.2 million sq. ft. of retail with a unique mix of premium fashion brands, factory outlets, restaurants and first-to-market retailers, as well as a 1,100-seat food hall. It is modelled on the successful CrossIron Mills in the Calgary Region and Vaughan Mills in the Greater Toronto Area.
